summary: This is an internal email from a Captain at the Metropolitan Correctional Center reminding a Lieutenant to submit a supervisor memorandum regarding the 'inmate Epstein incident' that occurred on August 10, 2019. It highlights the administrative follow-up required after the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Thabita
persons.context: Addressed in the email as 'Lt.' and is being reminded to submit a supervisor memorandum regarding the Epstein incident.

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: Author of the email, instructing Lieutenant Thabita to submit the required memorandum.

connections.description: The Captain is directing Lieutenant Thabita to complete and submit a report, indicating a chain of command relationship.

events.title: Inmate Epstein Incident
events.description: An incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Memorandum Submission Deadline
events.description: The deadline for Lieutenant Thabita to submit the complete supervisor memorandum regarding the Epstein incident.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, referencing an 'inmate Epstein incident' that occurred on August 10, 2019.
A Captain at the Metropolitan Correctional Center is directing a Lieutenant named Thabita to submit a supervisor memorandum about the incident by August 13, 2019.
The email indicates internal administrative procedures were initiated immediately following the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.
